Class Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ubu.XRayDetector.modelo.feature.Feature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Haralick, Lbp, Standard

    public abstract class Feature
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass of the Strategy pattern that controls the features.

    Joaquín Bravo Panadero , Adrián Gonzalez Duarte
